meta.name: ActiveLink
meta.description: Opens other apps like browser, maps etc.

article.title: Introduction
article.p: ActiveLink can be used to open a URL in a default web browser, show address in a maps app and more.
Install it by typing npm i @neft/active-link and later use it by const activeLink = require('@neft/active-link').

method.p: Opens a web browser with the given website URL.
Opens user's default e-mail app with predefined receiver address and subject.
Opens user's default map app with the given latitude and longitute or an address.
